title: When you can't stop the enemy from taking the Nexus, so you charge and kill the support 1 more time

replies.body: http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/58/588b6f13119e460dbb581ff2cb7539c9a123f4f6e0dd13f8fd958464ffb533f2.jpg
http://media.tenor.co/images/60c8837f505786968f6726f4e98e41f1/raw

Ruining perfect KDAs since 2009
http://i.imgur.com/pgkeang.png
https://m.popkey.co/ee1bd0/b00yr.gif
http://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/17/179932/2765632-rage+building+kratos.gif
lol that name though, it is just awesome.

Perfect Sona KDA? Not even close. Should have at least been 31/1/0 for starters. Then you can worry about the death... but only if your ADC ragequit.

#Sona S+ Mechanics

I'm a good support tho. I don't KS.
I only feed myself from the {{item:3070}} of my enemies.

Plus, I got an S+ that game.

> Plus, I got an S+ that game.

Must have been the tears of your enemies.

Kill the ADC instead.

At least now you're spitting on the prideful one.

kappa, mind
https://media.giphy.com/media/l0HlL4BrgXwebySQM/giphy.gif
Not if its a tanky supp {{champion:12}} {{champion:223}}  {{champion:201}}  {{champion:89}}  {{champion:44}}  {{champion:111}}
{{champion:67}} yum
{{champion:114}} I long for a worthy opponent who can counter my true damage without CC.
+1 for vintage Star Trek

-1 because how can you look at this fondly
http://67.media.tumblr.com/069198374d56666e8031b6bf818716c8/tumblr_mn49z7qBfs1qfns5so1_500.gif

> [{quoted}](name=sleepensues,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=12u5dlrc,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-08-26T19:29:14.808+0000)
>
> ... how can you look at this fondly...

There's a puppy in an alien costume. There's your answer. AND DON'T YOU DARE QUESTION IT.
Puppy!
https://media.giphy.com/media/tsgNNs93oIbwk/giphy.gif
Had this happen in a game of mine today, except sort of backwards. The enemy support came out and killed our adc as I (the support) finished the nexus. xD
Killing the enemy support is my favourite thing to do.
If you're riven, they mostly get you instead.
